author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Unborn Child of Actress Injured In Park Slope Crash Dies
text:
The unborn daughter of Ruthie Ann Blumenstein, the Tony-Award winning actress who was severely hurt while pregnant in a deadly Brooklyn crash, has died from injuries sustained in the accident, according to a lawyer for Ms. Blumenstein.
Ms. Blumensteinâ€™s daughter, Abigail, and Joshua Lew, 20 months, were killed in March when a Staten Island motorist plowed into the pedestrians in the Park Slope crosswalk. Abigail was 5 years old, according to a lawyer for the Blumenstein family, although authorities had previously said she...
